data.marketing-page-features-description: andcards Suite 기능 및 연동을 대해 알아보세요.
data.marketing-page-features-headline-2: andcards는 주요 기능을 포합되고 코워킹스페이스를 관리룰 위한 최고 앱과 연동합니다.
data.marketing-page-features-section-apps-ben: Organize benefits and services to accept member applications
data.marketing-page-features-section-apps-boo: Automate meeting room booking, free hour credits and payments
data.marketing-page-features-section-apps-dir: Consolidate all coworking space customer data
data.marketing-page-features-section-testimon: Loved by members and community managers
Since we adopted andcards, our bookings doubled. It’s so easy to book that meeting rooms are always full!
andcards application is ideal for managing shared spaces and coworking. It is simple, visual, at a very competitive price and has all the necessary tools.
